sentences.english: If dam breaks, a flash flood could threaten downstream villages. (AP Photo/Shabbir Ahmed Mir)
sentences.chinese: 如果大壩決口，暴漲和洪水可能威脅到下游的村民。

sentences.english: But that day there is a Storm plus rain, the water level of the river increase tremendously, wind fast rain strong.
sentences.chinese: 但是那一天出現了暴風雨，河水暴漲，風急雨勁。

sentences.english: Experienced when the boom collapsed, many customers choose wait and see.
sentences.chinese: 在經歷暴漲暴跌時，許多客戶選擇觀望。

sentences.english: Grain smuggling showed up when the world's food prices surged .
sentences.chinese: 糧食走私案件的背後是國際糧食市場的暴漲行情。

sentences.english: This summer, world wheat prices have spiked again (see article).
sentences.chinese: 今年夏天，世界小麥價格再次暴漲。

sentences.english: This autumn we can look forward to falling leaves and rising gas prices.
sentences.chinese: 秋天，我們可以期待紛飛的落葉和暴漲的油價。

sentences.english: Manila's rivers and canals are rising after a night of monsoon rains.
sentences.chinese: 在一夜季雨來臨之後，馬尼拉河水和運河水勢暴漲。

sentences.english: It is found that institutional investors aggravate the instability of financial markets.
sentences.chinese: 機構投資者是股市暴漲暴跌的助推器。

sentences.english: With the dollar’s demise, import prices skyrocketed.
sentences.chinese: 隨着美元崩盤，進口價格暴漲。

sentences.english: All stock prices have jumped up this month.
sentences.chinese: 本月所有股票的價格都已暴漲。

sentences.english: Economists are scratching their heads to explain the price jump.
sentences.chinese: 如何解釋肉價暴漲讓經濟學家撓頭不已。

sentences.english: Google ( GOOG - news - people ) gaps up 60 points overnight on its blow-out earnings.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌在它的井噴收入的作用下，暴漲60個點。

sentences.english: Wang said that the two-child policy will not lead to a population boom.
sentences.chinese: 二胎政策一旦放開會不會導致人口暴漲？

sentences.english: The recent development in string theory is the concept of brane inflation.
sentences.chinese: 在弦論的研究中人們提出了膜暴漲的概念。

sentences.english: A bus crosses a bridge over the swollen Ouse.
sentences.chinese: 一輛巴士駛上橫跨河水暴漲的烏斯河一座大橋。

sentences.english: From June to September the Nile rises and submerges the whole valley.
sentences.chinese: 從六月到九月，河水暴漲，淹沒了整個流域。

definition: to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to flee from danger/to avoid danger/to minimize risk/(finance) hedge
to become hot/temperature rise/(fig.) to intensify/to hot up/to escalate/to get a boost
to surge up/to rise/(of tensions etc) to run high
the tide rises, the boat floats (idiom); fig. to change with the overall trend/to develop according to the situation
to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
